Description:
We are currently seeking an efficient Administrative Assistant to join our team. As an Administrative Assistant, you will play a crucial role in maintaining the day-to-day operations of our organization. Your ability to handle various administrative tasks with precision and professionalism will be essential in supporting the smooth functioning of our business.ResponsibilitiesHandle incoming calls, emails and messages on social media.
Handle posting on social media
Help our students in navigating through their studies and with troubleshooting (we will provide training for this)
Prepare and edit documents, reports, and presentations as needed.
Handle sensitive and confidential information discreetly.
Accurately input data into our company database and update records regularly.
Assist in coordinating company events, meetings, and conferences.Working Days: Monday to FridayWorking hours: 9am - 5pmLocation: GemayzeSalary: 500 USDSkills
Skills:
Proficiency in using office software, including Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant tools.
Strong communication and organizational skills.
Ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently and meet deadlines.
Discretion and integrity in handling confidential information.
Problem-solving abilities and a proactive approach to challenges.
A professional and business-like demeanor.
Fluency in English & Arabic.
A passion for fashion is a plus.
To apply, please submit your resume along with any relevant information that showcases your administrative capabilities. Thank you for your interest in joining our team.
